activities: OpenWater is an online submission and review platform that strives to provide the easiest way for you to collect information over the internet. OpenWater is used by people who are interested in creating forms to collect information or perform a variety of other tasks related to review ("Program Managers"), and by people who fill out these forms ("Submitters").
eucountries: France, Germany, Iceland, Ireland, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Name, email address, payment information, responses to forms.Collected when user provides or as user navigates site.  No manually processed data is retained.
privacyprograms: Our organization does not receive organization human resources data.  As such our policy is to cooperate and comply with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) to investigate unresolved complaints
recoursemech: Our organization does not receive organization human resources data.  As such our policy is to cooperate and comply with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) to investigate unresolved complaints
